summary: Request to make the Destroyable interface public so developers can define custom memory cleanup rules when workflows are unloaded from memory.
userImpact: Developers cannot currently implement custom cleanup logic when workflows are removed from memory without access to the Destroyable interface.
proposedFix: Make the Destroyable interface public to allow developers to implement custom cleanup rules.
resolutionDetails: The Destroyable interface was made public in a subsequent release.
keyQuote: Make the Destroyable interface public so that developers can define memory cleanup rules when unloading a Workflow from memory.
